body:
## Requirement - what kind of business use case are you trying to solve?

Broken link in CONTRIBUTING_GUIDELINES.md on line 48 and in text that appears when you open PR.
**Before creating a pull request, please make sure:**
- Your PR is solving one problem
- You have read the guide for contributing
  - See https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
- You signed all your commits (otherwise we won't be able to merge the PR)
  - See **https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#sign-your-work**
                   **^^^HERE^^^**
- You added unit tests for the new functionality
- You mention in the PR description which issue it is addressing, e.g. "Resolves #123"

Maybe somewhere else.

## Problem - what in Jaeger blocks you from solving the requirement?

Link is wrong and not working.

## Proposal - what do you suggest to solve the problem or improve the existing situation?

I can guess it can be simple solved by change 
```
https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING_GUIDELINES.md#sign-your-work
```
to
```
https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING_GUIDELINES.md#certificate-of-origin---sign-your-work
``` 
in all places where it is used.
title: Broken link in different places
